reviewText: Considered to be "The BEST" of the various movie company reviews...BUT...not in my opinion.  Don't take me wrong as it is a GOOD and ENJOYABLE vaudeville comedy/song & dance vehicle of the period.  "Hollywood Review" (M-G-M) and "Show of Shows" (WB) have a lot more memorable songs and moments.  Still "P-O-P" is a must have to complete the set.

The movie itself is a great piece of history and entertainment, but the hack job done on the digital transfer should be a punishable crime. Whoever did it completely disregarded the original aspect ratio and cropped off the top of the film in order to make it widescreen. What a shame.
